short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add $MOAI daily stake yield to jpg.store listings.  More sites to be supported in the future?

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tool to quickly view daily stake yield for various Moai assets on sites. (currently supporting jpg.store lists & asset pages)
